reviews.review_msg: Dr. Salters is a really great prof! This course, in general, was very interesting and the content matter was very engaging. I am not a HSCI major but this class definitely made me look into taking more HSCI classes. The class wasn't difficult. Be sure to read the textbook and keep up to date with the lectures. Overall, I would definitely recommend!
Kate is a great teacher! Her lectures are very informative and crystal clear. She knows her stuff and makes sure that you know exactly what to expect. Definitely would take her again!
